post:
We have a low-end configuration available in Khabarovsk, Russia. Connectivity via Rostelecom, Transtelecom, MTS and Megafon are available. This location provides low latency to Japan (30ms).

In addition, we also offer high-performance virtual machines in Oslo, Norway at standard pricing.

<u>**Virtual Server in Khabarovsk, Russia (LET configuration)**</u>

vCPU: 1 core (2x E5-2660-v2)

Memory: 768MB DDR4

Storage: 10GB Hardware RAID 10 (6x SAS drives)

Traffic allocation: 700GB (bi-directional) @ 1Gbps

Includes 1x IPv4 address and control panel access.

Price: $7/month recurring.

**Order link: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=134**

Please send us a support ticket if you need custom packages or the listed plans are sold out. We may have alternatives. We accept a variety of payment methods such as PayPal and Credit/debit cards.

Fraud check - Please do not order from a VPN or proxy, otherwise your order will be flagged by our system. The address entered must be valid. We do not provide services to anonymous users. 

VM IP changes are not allowed for any reason. Refunds will not provided for IP issues. For successful automatic setup upon payment, please do not enter any symbols such as '@' in the hostname. Only letters and numbers are supported. Newer templates such as Ubuntu 16/18 are available in the control panel for VM reinstallation.

Thank you!
